abstract.p: Pesticide spraying schedule for New York City area (S)

block.p: QUEENS 10 tonight to 5 a.m. tomorrow Rikers Island, Astoria, Beechhurst, Bay Terrace, Fort Totten and Whitestone 10 tomorrow to 5 a.m. Tuesday Breezy Point, Roxbury, Neponsit, Belle Harbor, Rockaway Park, Seaside, Astoria, Sunnyside, Elmhurst, East Elmhurst, Jackson Heights, Woodside, Maspeth/West Maspeth and Middle Village
BRONX 10 tonight to 5 a.m. tomorrow Concourse Village, Hunts Point, Longwood, Mott Haven, Melrose, Morrisania and Throgs Neck
ROCKLAND COUNTY 10 p.m. tomorrow to 5 a.m. Tuesday Orangetown

QUEENS 10 tonight to 5 a.m. tomorrow Rikers Island, Astoria, Beechhurst, Bay Terrace, Fort Totten and Whitestone 10 tomorrow to 5 a.m. Tuesday Breezy Point, Roxbury, Neponsit, Belle Harbor, Rockaway Park, Seaside, Astoria, Sunnyside, Elmhurst, East Elmhurst, Jackson Heights, Woodside, Maspeth/West Maspeth and Middle Village
BRONX 10 tonight to 5 a.m. tomorrow Concourse Village, Hunts Point, Longwood, Mott Haven, Melrose, Morrisania and Throgs Neck
ROCKLAND COUNTY 10 p.m. tomorrow to 5 a.m. Tuesday Orangetown
WESTCHESTER COUNTY 11:30 p.m. tomorrow to 4:30 a.m. Tuesday Rye Brook, Port Chester, Mount Vernon, Pelham Manor, Pelham Village and Irvington.
BERGEN COUNTY, N.J. 3 to 6 a.m. tomorrow Edgewater, Cliffside Park, Fairview, Ridgefield, Leonia, Ridgefield Park,
Bogota, Cresskill, Alpine, Englewood Cliffs, Englewood, Bergenfield, Teaneck and Tenafly
MIDDLESEX COUNTY, N.J. 7 to 11 p.m. tomorrow Carteret

MONMOUTH COUNTY, N.J. 7 to 11 p.m. tonight Sections of Keansburg, Middletown Township (East Keansburg, Ideal Beach, Harmony and Port Monmouth) and sections of Hazlet Township 4:30 to 6:30 a.m. tomorrow Sections of Keansburg 7 to 11 p.m. tomorrow Sections of Middletown (East Keansburg, Ideal Beach, Harmony and Port Monmouth) and Hazlet Township
FOR INFORMATION New York City (877) 968-4692 Nassau County (516) 571-2500 Suffolk County (631) 852-4939 Rockland County (845) 364-8990 Westchester County (914) 637-2420 Connecticut (860) 424-4184
Note: Spraying schedules are subject to change in the event of rain. (Source: Health departments)
